title: Watson Spring (Oregon County, Missouri)
text:
Watson Spring is a <a href="Spring%20%28hydrology%29">spring</a> in <a href="Oregon%20County%2C%20Missouri">Oregon County</a> in the <a href="Ozarks">Ozarks</a> of southern <a href="Missouri">Missouri</a>.
Watson Spring has the name of Samuel Watson, a pioneer citizen.
